amendment.description: Amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 106, 107, 108, 109, 112, 113, 114, 115, 116, 117, 118, 119, 120, 121, 122, 123, 124, 125, and 126 printed in House Report 112-88.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-88 offered as en bloc # 4: Nos. 106, 107, 108, 109, 112, 113, 114, 115, 116, 117, 118, 119, 120, 121, 122, 123, 124, 125, 126.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A046) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
